## Tender Notice for Gas Sensors and Building Automation Systems Maintenance
### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the maintenance of gas sensors and building automation systems at the 4 Wing RP Ops detachment in Cold Lake, Alberta.

### Solicitation Information
| Date | Information |
| --- | --- |
| **Publication Date** | April 4, 2024 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | April 24, 2024, 14:00 ET |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | April 30, 2024 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | None |

### Tender Details
This is a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The tender is competitive and open to all eligible contractors. The selection criterion is the lowest price.

### Contract Information
| Contract Details | Information |
| --- | --- |
| **Contracting Entity** | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |
| **Address** | 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada |
| **Contact Person** | Ben Wong (SPAC/PSPC) |
| **Contact Email** | [ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) |

### Tender Process
To submit a proposal, contractors must provide all required supporting documentation and responses by the response deadline time of 14:00 ET on April 24, 2024. Any submissions received after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

### Contract Term
The standing offer will be issued for a term of three years. If authorized, the offeror may extend their offer for two additional one-year periods under the same conditions and at the specified rates or prices.

### Tender Documents
For more information, please visit the [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19307876?extsite=MTkzMDc4NzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) website.
